title: Pessamal  Lyrics Mounam Sollum Varthaigal
stanzas:
<div>
<div>
Pessamal  Lyrics Mounam Sollum Varthaigal Album

Pesaamal undhan mounam
enthan nenjile
kadhal valaiyai
veesi selgirathe.

pookkaatho undhan mounam
ennai kaanum velaiyil
kadhal vaasam
engum  veesumadaa.

nadhiye kadalil seraadhe
ennul kalandhu vidu.
mazhaiye mannai seraadhe
nenjil nirandhuvidu.

Pesaamal undhan mounam
enthan nenjile
kadhal valaiyai
veesi selgirathe.

pookkaatho undhan mounam
ennai kaanum velaiyil
kadhal vaasam
engum  veesumadaa.

paakkaamal ennai neeyum
thaandi sellum velai
paarthene undhan kannil
ennai thallum podhai. (2)

pada pada padavena
maarum vaanam
pattena neeyum paarthal.
en vaaname neeyadaa
neeye neeye thaanadaa

silu silu silunu
veesum kaatru
siridhaai neeyum siriththaai.
en vaazhakaiye neeyadaa
neeye neeye thaanadaa

Pesaamal.. Pesaamal..
Pesaamal undhan mounam
enthan nenjile
kadhal valaiyai
veesi selgirathe.

pookkaatho undhan mounam
ennai kaanum velaiyil
kadhal vaasam
engum  veesumadaa.

pesaatha undhan kannil
ennai kaanum velai.
thaanaaga aavaeno
unnal naanum oomai(2)

vizhiye vizhiye kadhal vizhiye
ennai orumurai paarthaal
vaanilai maarume
vaanil villum thondrume.

kaviye kaviye aanami kaviye
ennai orumurai paarthaal
pudhu thaaiyuru raagame
paadal paada thondrume.

Pesaamal undhan mounam
enthan nenjile
kadhal valaiyai
veesi selgirathe.

pookkaatho undhan mounam
ennai kaanum velaiyil
kadhal vaasam
engum  veesumadaa.
